entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
